description: Use up ripe bananas by making these blueberry, banana and pepita oat bars. Your little ones are sure to love this nutritionally approved snack.
name: Blueberry, Banana & Pepita Oat Bars Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 25 minutes or until golden brown. Cool completely in pan. Cut into 16 pieces. Store in a baking paper-lined airtight container in the fridge.
